alert.note: Alert for Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 17 at 9:11PM EDT until August 17 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Trumbull County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 911 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Warren, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Warren, Niles, Hubbard, Cortland, Newton Falls, Lordstown, Vienna Center, Hilltop, Maplewood Park, Leavittsburg, Girard, Vienna, McDonald, Orangeville, Yankee Lake, Brookfield Center, South Canal, Churchill, Howland Center and Bolindale. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
